results.byline: By Ellen Gabler, Steve Eder and Allie Pitchon
results.title: A Top New York Hospital, an Unapproved Treatment and an F.D.A. Warning
results.abstract: A product made from umbilical cord blood was used in spine surgeries at a Manhattan hospital. After a federal warning came an internal complaint: Patients should have been told.

results.title: U.S. Will Allow Nearly 500,000 Venezuelan Migrants to Work Legally
results.abstract: The move, announced late Wednesday, followed intense lobbying by New York Democrats before and during President Biden’s visit to New York City this week.

results.title: Temple University’s Acting President Dies After Becoming Ill Onstage
